blank_screen_causes.name: Provider Deadlock
blank_screen_causes.description: Provider tries to read localStorage/sessionStorage during initialization
blank_screen_causes.fix: Wrap in useEffect or conditional check

blank_screen_causes.name: CSS Zero Height
blank_screen_causes.description: Root container has height: 0 or display: none
blank_screen_causes.detection: Check root div CSS for zero dimensions

blank_screen_causes.name: Suspense Boundary Missing
blank_screen_causes.detection: Components with async operations or lazy loading

blank_screen_causes.name: Firebase Init Race
blank_screen_causes.fix: Await initialization or add loading state

blank_screen_causes.name: Context Provider Missing
blank_screen_causes.description: Component uses useContext but no Provider in tree
blank_screen_causes.fix: Add Provider higher in component tree

blank_screen_causes.name: Hook Violation
blank_screen_causes.description: Hooks called conditionally or in loops
blank_screen_causes.fix: Move hooks to top level of component

blank_screen_causes.name: Import Cycle
blank_screen_causes.detection: File A imports B, B imports A
blank_screen_causes.fix: Break cycle with lazy import or refactor
blank_screen_causes.example: auth.js imports user.js, user.js imports auth.js

blank_screen_causes.name: Z-Index War
blank_screen_causes.description: Elements hidden behind others with higher z-index
blank_screen_causes.detection: Root element has low z-index or position issues
blank_screen_causes.fix: Ensure root has proper z-index and positioning
blank_screen_causes.example: #root { z-index: -1; } or position: fixed without top/left

blank_screen_causes.name: Visibility Inheritance
blank_screen_causes.description: Parent has visibility: hidden or opacity: 0
symptoms: Elements in DOM but not visible
blank_screen_causes.fix: Remove visibility: hidden or set opacity: 1

blank_screen_causes.name: Module Scope Side Effect
blank_screen_causes.description: Code runs at module level and blocks render
blank_screen_causes.detection: API calls, calculations, or logic at top level
blank_screen_causes.fix: Move to useEffect or event handler
blank_screen_causes.example: fetch('/api') at top level of component file
